title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Gather, document and refine functional and non-functional requirements for the UtopianSocietyDesigner platform. This includes defining user stories, use cases, system constraints, key performance indicators (KPIs), and outlining expected features such as simulation complexity levels, societal structure types, data visualization options, collaboration tools, and the user interface design. Document any potential technical limitations and constraints that may impact the project, and consider accessibility and usability factors. Also, provide suggestions for integrating machine learning algorithms to improve user experience. Document this revised RFC clearly and concisely, ensuring all necessary details are included. Update the task if needed when complete.

title: Design System Architecture for Utopian Society Designer
description: Define the overall system architecture for the Utopian Society Designer platform. This includes detailed specifications of the frontend, backend, database, and infrastructure components. The architecture should prioritize scalability, maintainability, and modularity to accommodate future growth and changes. Ensure proper separation of concerns and adherence to industry best practices such as microservices architecture. Consider the use of containerization (Docker) and cloud-native technologies (AWS or Google Cloud) for deployment and management. The data flow diagram should be included in the RFC for better understanding of the proposed system, along with a clear definition of API endpoints and their usage. It would also be beneficial to outline the data storage strategies, including any necessary indexing and caching strategies to ensure optimal performance.

title: Design User Interface and Experience
description: Create wireframes, mockups, and prototypes for the user interface, ensuring a seamless and intuitive experience for designing and simulating utopian societies.

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Implement the backend services responsible for handling user input, simulating societies, and managing data storage and retrieval.

title: Implement Frontend Components
description: Develop the frontend components and user interfaces for designing and visualizing utopian societies, integrating with the backend services.

title: Set up Database and Data Modeling
description: Design and implement the database schema and data models for storing and retrieving user-created societies and simulation data.

title: Implement Simulation Engine
description: Develop the core simulation engine responsible for modeling and simulating the dynamics of utopian societies based on user input and predefined rules.
dependencies: Set up Database and Data Modeling

title: Integrate Frontend and Backend
description: Ensure seamless communication and data exchange between the frontend and backend components, enabling real-time updates and synchronization.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a robust CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the UtopianSocietyDesigner platform.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the platform is secure by implementing appropriate authentication, authorization, and data protection mechanisms.

title: Conduct Thorough Testing
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the platform's functionality and reliability.

title: Prepare Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides to assist users in understanding and utilizing the UtopianSocietyDesigner platform effectively.
